subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The U.E.F.A. Champions League final, as Rummenigge implied, is all or nothing. Both sides are wounded by suspensions to key players in defense and midfield.
snippet: The U.E.F.A. Champions League final, as Rummenigge implied, is all or nothing. Both sides are wounded by suspensions to key players in defense and midfield.
